advancement.escalated.escalator_100.desc: Поднимитесь на 100 блоков вверх, передвигаясь только на эскалаторах
advancement.escalated.escalator_100_neth: Поднимитесь на 100 блоков вверх, передвигаясь только на эскалаторах, в Незере
advancement.escalated.handrail.desc: Украсьте эскалатор поручнями, кликнув по нему ремнём
advancement.escalated.walkway.desc: Соедините два вала траволатором или эскалатором
escalated.ponder.tag.walkways.descriptio: Компоненты, необходимые для размещения траволаторов и эскалаторов
escalated.ponder.walkways/adding_shafts_: Adding more Shafts to Walkways and Escalators
Additional shafts can be added to walkways for more power supply.
To add a shaft, Right-Click a middle walkway block with a Shaft item.
Once added, the walkway block side can be wrenched to block off rotational input from that side.
This also applies to walkway terminals.
To remove the shaft, wrench the block while Sneaking.
Shafts cannot be applied to escalators.
escalated.ponder.walkways/creating_walkw: Right-Click two shafts with a walkway steps item to create a walkway.
Accidental selections can be cancelled with Right-Click while Sneaking.
Due to the escalator structure, the shafts are not aligned on a perfect diagonal.
The horizontal distance between the shafts is 3 blocks greater than the vertical distance.
escalated.ponder.walkways/customizing_wa: Customizing Walkways and Escalators with Dyes and Handrails
Walkway and escalator steps can be dyed by Right-Clicking them with a dye item.
To remove the dye, Right-Click the walkway with a water item.
Handrails can be added to the walkway by Right-Clicking the walkway with a belt item.
This will only work if there is space above the walkway.
The handrails can also be dyed and cleaned just like the walkway.
Finally, the handrails can also be made into glass by Right-Clicking them with a glass block.
escalated.ponder.walkways/widening_walkw: Walkways can be widened by connecting a walkway with an adjacent shaft.
The widening also widens handrails on top.
However, if the handrail is obstructed by something, the handrail will break.
